ARABIC: ثُمَّ يَأْتِى مِنۢ بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ عَامٌ فِيهِ يُغَاثُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَفِيهِ يَعْصِرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then after that another year will come in which the people will be helped by rain in plenty and when they once more will press.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: This will be followed by a year of rain, and people shall press (the grapes)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then there will come a year when people will be helped by plenty of rain and they will press (grapes)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Then there will be a year with plenty of rain and people will have sufficient milk and other produce."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Then after that will come a year when the people will be given rain and in which they will extract juices.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then thereafter will come a year in which people will have abundant rain and in which they will press (wine and oil)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then there will come after that a year in which people shall have rain and in which they shall press (grapes).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then thereafter there shall come a year wherein the people will be succoured and press in season.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then, after that, will come a year when the people will have plenteous crops and when they will press (wine and oil).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then a year will come after that when people will have abundant rain and when once more they will press [wine and oil]."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then thereafter will come a year wherein mankind will have rain and wherein they will press.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then after that there will come a year wherein the people will be granted relief and provided with rains therein.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then will come after that (period) a year in which the people will have abundant water, and in which they will press (wine and oil)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then thereafter will come a year in which people will have abundant rain and in which they will press (wine and oil)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Then, there will come a year in which people are helped, in which the people will press'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then after that will come a year that brings relief to the people, and during which they will press.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then will come after that a year in which the people will be given rain and in which they will press [olives and grapes]."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [12:49] Then after that, in other words, after the seven barren years, there shall come a year in which the people will be granted relief, through rain, and in which they will press [fruit], grapes, and other [seeds], because of its [that year’s] fertility.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then, after that) after the years of drought, (will come a year when the people) of Egypt (will have plenteous crops) foodstuffs and rain (and when they will press) wine and oils.
